name: Panic-Con
description:
You're a newcomer cosplayer in Comic-con. Your objective: Avoid and end with the people that can ruin your experience at the con and get to your fiend's stand. You will use your magical girl cosplay props for your task to combat the different enemies.

Just enjoy this game we did :D

Devs:

Adrián Morillas Marco: Programmer, Game Designer

Twitter: @morillas_adrian

Twitter: @Guille_melendez
